text: kaho, "kya tumane socha bhee (ki tumhaara kya parinaam hoga)? yadi vah (quraan) allaah ke yahaan se hua aur tumane usaka inakaar kar diya, haalaanki isaraeel kee santaan mein se ek gavaah ne usake ek bhaag kee gavaahee bhee dee. so vah eemaan le aaya aur tum ghamand mein pade rahe. allaah to zaalim logon ko maarg nahin dikhaata.
